metadata.summary: EcoBloom summer campaign planning is underway with a July 28, 2025 deadline. Content, designs, and legal reviews are being coordinated. Key deadlines include content by June 30, designs by July 10, and legal review by July 14.

metadata.title: FitFusion Brand Guidelines Development & Approval
metadata.summary: Team collaborated on FitFusion's brand guidelines, with @Sam leading development, @Leah providing messaging, and @Jordan ensuring legal compliance. Guidelines were drafted, reviewed, revised, and approved by August 3, 2025, meeting the August 5 deadline.

action_items.task: Lead development of FitFusion's brand guidelines
Provide messaging and tone of voice guidelines
